How Do I Pay?
=============

Online Payment of Fees:
-----------------------

1. Login to the [**Citizen Portal**](https://www.arlingtonwa.gov/430/Permit-Applications) using the Apply Online button and navigate to My Dashboard
2. Click on Make a Payment and enter the Invoice Number for the permit fees you would like to pay. The Invoice Number can be found by clicking on My Dashboard>My Invoices

### \*\*Notice\*\*

The City of Arlington is excited to announce an upgrade to the permitting software of which has been launched and is up and running.  We understand that changes can be challenging, and we appreciate your patience and cooperation as we strive to make this process as smooth as possible.

### If you have any questions or require support, please do not hesitate to contact the City of Arlington Community & Economic Development Department at 360-403-3551 or [ced@arlingtonwa.gov](mailto:ced@arlingtonwa.gov). Thank you for your continued support and understanding.

We accept payments in the form of check, debit or credit card. There is a 3% surcharge fee for credit card transactions.
